title: Populist Brexiteer Nigel Farage wins first-ever seat in British parliament
content: After seven failed attempts, Nigel Farage has won a seat in the U.K.'s parliament.
summary: After seven failed attempts, Nigel Farage has won a seat in the U.K.'s parliament.

title: Japan's Nikkei crosses 41,000 mark to hit fresh all-time high amid mixed Asia markets
content: The Nikkei gained 0.22% to extend its run from Thursday, but the broad-based Topix faltered and dipped from its record, sliding 0.15%.
summary: The Nikkei gained 0.22% to extend its run from Thursday, but the broad-based Topix faltered and dipped from its record, sliding 0.15%.

title: Nigel Farage's right-wing Reform UK party shocks with significant gains expected

title: CNBC Daily Open: UK Labour landslide victory, exit poll says
content: The center-left Labour Party is projected to win the U.K. election by a landslide, according to an exit poll, ending 14 years of Conservative rule.

title: Who is Labour's Keir Starmer, the likely new leader of Britain?

title: U.S. named the worst place for British families to move abroad. Here's why
content: The U.S. comes in last in a ranking of 28 countries, dragged down by high childcare costs, long work hours and lack of federally mandated paid parental leave.

title: Bitcoin slides to two-month low as Fed signals it's not ready to cut rates yet

title: Saks Fifth Avenue parent HBC to acquire Neiman Marcus Group in $2.65 billion deal
content: The deal will establish Saks Global, which will include Saks Fifth Avenue, Saks OFF 5TH, Neiman Marcus' namesake department store chain and Bergdorf Goodman.
